snippet: Robert H. Benmosche, the American International Group's chief executive, congratulated A.I.G.'s employees on their work reviving the company as the Treasury Department sold off the government's remaining stake at a profit.
abstract: Robert H. Benmosche, the American International Group's chief executive, congratulated A.I.G.'s employees on their work reviving the company as the Treasury Department sold off the government's remaining stake at a profit.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: 'You Did It,' A.I.G. Chief Tells Workers
